org.kepler.ssh

Class SshEventRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.ssh.SshEventRegistry

  • public class SshEventRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a registry to store subscriptions to SshEvents.

    Author:
    Norbert Podhorszki

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static SshEventRegistry instance 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(SshEventListener listener)
      Append a listener to the current set of ssh event listeners.
      protected void notifyListeners(SshEvent event)
      Send a SshEvent to all listeners.

    • Field Detail

      • instance

        public static final SshEventRegistry instance

    • Method Detail

      • addListener

        public void addListener(SshEventListener listener)
        Append a listener to the current set of ssh event listeners. If the listener is already in the set, it will not be added again.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to which to send SshEvent messages.
        See Also:
        removeListener(SshEventListener)

      • notifyListeners

        protected final void notifyListeners(SshEvent event)
        Send a SshEvent to all listeners.
        Parameters:
        event - The event.

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(SshEventListener listener)
        Unregister an event listener. If the specified listener has not been previously registered, then do nothing.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to remove from the list of listeners to which SshEvent messages are sent.
        See Also:
        addListener(SshEventListener)
